events.text:
Because sooner or later... I would've killed you.
But don't worry...
Once a more thorough investigation is done on Shinji, you'll be cleared out of suspicion for sure.
And they'll figure out I was the real killer.
But I would be long gone by then. I know I couldn't stay in this school forever.
I had so much fun here, though. I won't lie about that.
Farewell, Sayu.
ENDING 3/3: [b]Betrayed[b]
